title: The Heng Balance Lamp Illuminates with a Suspended Magnetic Switch
text:
Design The Heng Balance Lamp Illuminates with a Suspended Magnetic Switch by Christopher Jobson on January 2, 2017 
Seeking a novel way to redesign a light switch while simultaneously retaining a functional and aesthetically pleasing object was the design challenge for Netherlands-based designer Arthur Limpens of Allocacoc DesignNest. His solution was the Heng Balance Lamp , a fun desktop light that relies on a pair of magnets suspended on strings to pull an internal switch. The design concept won a Red Dot Design Award last year, and Allocacoc is now lauching an edition of the lamp through Kickstarter . See related posts on Colossal about lighting , magnets .
